column4: hey guys, transmission bittorrent will sometimes minimize and i cant see it, how do i get it back up on screen?
transmission bittorrent client minimizes but it isnt in the panel, how do i get it back?
how do you know it's only minimized? is the process still in system monitor?
i kno because when i click on it again it says its already running and i see it in the system tray
